258158.「待たせたな。\n 許可は もらってきたぜ。: Thanks for waiting. I got permission.

258160.「そもそも お前たちは 何者なんだ？\n 得体の知れないチカラを あやつり\n:
Who exactly are you people, anyway? You're
controlling some mysterious power, and
orchestrating ridiculous rituals...

258161.「その話は いずれ……。\n 今は 破壊神との戦いの準備に\n 集中してください:
We'll talk about that later... For now, please
focus on preparing for your battle with the
Master of Destruction.

258162.「フン。では 楽しみにとっておこう。: Hmph. Then I'll be looking forward to it.

258163.「暗黒球へ侵入するための 扉をひらきます。:
We will open a door that leads inside the orb
of darkness.

258166.「ここから じかに 破壊神が生みだした\n 暗黒球内部へ 行けます。:
From here, you can go directly inside the orb
of darkness created by the Master of
Destruction himself.

258167.「破壊神がいるのは 暗黒球の中心だろう。\n 奴は そこで 偽りの世界を滅ぼす光:
He is most likely within the inner depths of the orb. There, he will unleash a light that will destroy the false world... A light of
ultimate destruction.

258168.「戦うつもりなら 急ぐんだな。: If you plan to fight him, you'd better hurry.

258169.「……さてと これで 義理は果たしたぜ。\n あとは お前らで なんとかしな。:
...Well, we've done our duty. The rest is up
to you, now.

258171.「前にも言ったろ。\n 俺は 破壊神に手出しできないって。:
We told you before. We can't even lay a finger
on him.

258172.「まっ 気負わずに やれや。 \n 失敗しても 責める奴はいない。\n 滅びは:
Well, don't get carried away and go for it. If
you fail, you'll have no one to blame. Your
destruction will be instantaneous.

258173.「……彼だけでは ありません。\n 私も 破壊神に対し 無力です。:
...He is not the only one. I, too, am
powerless against the Master of Destruction.

258174.「いかなる干渉も 受けつけない代わりに\n 影響を与えることも できない……。\:
In exchange for allowing you to intervene, we
ourselves cannot intervene... such were the
conditions placed on us.

258175.「ああ 忘れていたよ！ \n お前たちは いつだって そうだったものな。\n 忘:
Ah, I forgot! You've always been like that. I
was a fool to forget.

258176.「フフ。そう 腐らないでください。\n 代わりに 別のパーティと\n 同盟を組め:
Hmhm, no need to be so sour. Instead, I've
made it possible for you to ally with another
party.

258177.「暗黒球の中で 他の冒険者たちと\n 同盟を組むのです。単独のパーティでは\n:
Inside the orb of darkness, you will form an
alliance with other adventurers. A lone party
will not stand a chance whatsoever...

258178.「それと 出発前に いくつか\n 説明しておきたいことが あるので\n あらため:
Also, there are a few things I'd like to
explain to you before you depart, so please
speak to me again.

258180.「先に進むのが 不安になるな……\n 本当に この先に 破壊神がいるのか？:
I'm getting nervous about moving forward... is
the Master of Destruction really up ahead?

258181.「いや 怖気づいていても しょうがないな。\n どの道 進むしかないんだ！:
No, we can't be afraid. We have to keep moving
forward!

258183.「どこに出た……\n 暗黒球の 中じゃないのか？:
Where are we... are we still inside the orb of
darkness?

258184.「こいつが 破壊神……\n なんという 禍々しさだ。\n 見てるだけで 怖気が走:
So this is the Master of Destruction...how
terrifying... Just looking at him gives me an
unshakable sense of dread.

258185.「その上 この殺気……。\n 目をそらせば 即座に 殺されそうだ。:
And this murderous atmosphere... if I look
away even for a moment, I'll be killed
instantly.

258186.「なあ 相棒。\n こんなときだが……:
Hey, partner. I know this is a bad time,
but...

258187.「奴を倒したら ジャイラ密林に行かないか？\n 前々から 遺跡探検というやつを\:
After we beat this guy, why don't we go to
Jyra Jungle? I've always wanted to explore
those ruins.

258188.「聞けよ 破壊神！\n 我らが世界 壊させはせん！:
Hear me, Master of Destruction! You will not
destroy our world!

258189.「ここが お前の墓場だ！\n 我が剣の サビにしてくれよう！:
This place shall be your grave! Become a stain
upon my sword!

258190.「やったな 相棒！\n 我らの勝利だ！: We did it, partner! We won!

258211.「なんで ここなんだよ！\n 暗黒球から はなれなきゃ やべえだろうが！:
Why are we still here!? If we don't get away
from the orb of darkness, it'll end badly!

258212.「脱出するだけで 手いっぱいだったんです。\n もう一度 転移します。:
I had my hands full just getting us out. I'll
attempt another teleportation.

258214.「奇跡だ……造り物の意志が\n 破壊の神がもたらす滅びをも 凌駕した……。:
It's a miracle... that the will of something
artificial could triumph over the Master of
Destruction...

258215.「ははッ！ すっげえや！！\n こいつ ホントに 止めやがった！:
Ha ha! That was awesome! She actually stopped
him!

258217.「そうか……。だが 連れて帰ろう。\n こんなとこに放置じゃ 忍びないしな……。:
I see... but let's take her with us. It's not
right to just leave her here like this...

258218.「……あなたが護りぬいた 世界です。\n 以前と変わらぬ 景色ですが……見せたか:
...This is the world you protected. It's the
same as it always looked... but I still wanted
to show it to you.

258219.「何もかも 偽物の世界で たったひとつ……\n そこに生きる人々の 魂だけは 本:
Everything in this world is fake, with one
exception... the souls of the people living
here were real.

258220.「そいつの生きざまに 敬意を表し\n 丁重に 弔ってやらないとな……。:
We should pay our respects to her way of
living, and mourn her properly...

258221.「そうしましょう。この辺りで\n 埋葬に ふさわしい場所というと……。:
Then let's do it. The best place for a burial
around here would be...

258223.「世界を救った 英雄なんだ。\n 盛大に 弔ってやろうぜ。:
She's the champion who saved this world. Let's
honor her in a big way.

258225.「ムッ。人のカオを見て 失敬な！\n それより 破壊神は どうなった？:
Hmph, that's no way to look at someone! More
importantly, what about the Master of
Destruction?

258226.「……無事 暴発を止められました。\n あなたのおかげです。: ...The explosion was stopped, thanks to you.

258227.「てっきり 死んじまったかと 思ったぜ。\n ったく 人さわがせな ねーちゃんだ:
I thought she was dead. What a terrifying
girl...

258228.「しかも 前の姿に戻ってんぞ。: What's more, you're back to your old self.

258229.「フム。あのとき 秘石に込められたチカラと\n 護りの盾としての チカラを\n:
Hmm. At that time, she used up both the power
of the Stone of Protection and her power as
the Shield of Protection all at once...

258230.「それで 仮死状態に……ともあれ\n 生きていて よかった。:
So you were only nearly dead... but I'm glad
you're still alive.

258231.「チカラを失った私は どうなる？\n その……死んでしまうのか？:
Now that I've lost my powers, what will happen
to me? Will I die?

258232.「ほかの創られた人間と いっしょです。\n 命に関わるようなケガを 負わないかぎ:
You're just like any other human now. Unless
you suffer a fatal injury, you will not die
for some time.

258233.「そうか……ならば これからは\n 魔勇者でも 護りの盾でもない\n ただのクマ:
I see... I suppose I'll forget about being
an Evil Hero or the Shield of Protection,
and go on as just Kumaris.

258234.「……結局 お前たちは 何者なんだ？\n 破壊神を倒したんだ。\n そろそろ 教:
...So, who are you people, really? We defeated
Malroth, so I think it's time you told us the
truth.

258235.「世界は 偽りの世界と 真なる世界のほかにも\n 無数に存在します。:
There are countless other worlds besides the
false and the true.

258236.「我々は それらの世界を\n 見守る役目を になっている者です。:
We are the ones tasked with watching over
these worlds.

258237.「餞別だ。真の姿を 見せてやろう。:
Consider this a parting gift. Let us show you
our true forms.

258239.「破魂の審判を経た この世界は\n 二度と ヒズミが生じぬよう\n 修復されるで:
With the Judgment of Souls concluded, this
world will be restored so that it will never
form distortions again.

258240.「護りの手として 戦いぬいた あなたには\n こちらを お渡しします。お受け取り:
You have fought hard as the Hand of
Protection, and so I present you with this.
Please accept it.

258241.「……名残惜しいですが 別れの時です。\n しかし さよならは言いません。あなた:
...It's time for us to part ways. But this is
not goodbye. I have a feeling that we will
meet again...

258242.「クマリスさん。あなたは どうします？: What will you do now, Kumaris?

258244.「私は 旅に出ようと思う。\n この世界を 見て回りたくなった。:
I want to go on a journey. I want to see this
world with my own eyes.

258245.「相棒と 駆けずり回った日々が\n 存外 楽しかったのでな。:
I had a lot more fun running around with my
partner than I thought I would.

258246.「いっしょに どうだ……と\n 言いたいところだがな……わかってるよ。:
I'd ask you to come with me... but I already
know what you'd say.

258247.「お前には お前の旅があるものな。\n さみしいが ここで さよならしよう。:
You have your own journey. I'll miss you, but
let's say goodbye here.

258248.「さらばだ 相棒！ 共に祈ろう。\n 我らのゆく道が ふたたび 交わらんことを！:
Farewell, partner! Let us both pray that our
paths cross again some day!

264089.「異変を察知し 駆けつけたのですが……:
We noticed something was strange, and rushed
here...

264090.「破壊神を のしちまう 護りの手なんて\n 前代未聞だぜ。おそれいったよ。:
A Hand of Protection that can defeat the
Master of Destruction is unprecedented.
We were getting worried.

264091.「つまらん世辞はいい。\n それより 戻る手段がなくてな……。:
Spare us your lackluster concern. Besides, we
have no way to get back...

264092.「バカな！ 確実に しとめたはずだ！: Impossible! I'm sure we took him down!

264093.「よもや みずからを 自爆させることで\n この空間を……暗黒球のチカラを\n:
Is he trying to unleash the power of the orb
of darkness by self-destructing!?

264094.「なんだと！ じゃあ 世界は……。: What!? Then, the world will be...

264095.「いいえ。暗黒球に たくわえられた魔力が\n 充分ではありません。死滅の極光ほど:
No. The magical energy stored in the orb of
darkness is not enough. It won't be as
powerful as the Ultimate Light of Destruction.

264096.「ごちゃごちゃ 言ってんじゃねえ！\n 早く こっちに来い。ずらかるぞ！:
Stop yapping, already! Hurry and get over
here, we're wasting time!

264097.「待ってくれ！ \n このままだと どうなる？: Wait a second! What will happen, then?

264098.「世界の何割かは 失われるでしょうね。: Some part of this world will still be lost.

264099.「ですが 全滅するわけでは ありません。\n 運が良ければ いくらか人里も残るで:
But it won't be wiped out completely. With
luck, some human settlements will remain.

264100.「運まかせに できるかッ！\n 大勢 死ぬかもしれないんだぞ！:
We can't just leave it to chance! A lot of
people will die!

264101.「相棒！ 護り手の秘石を 貸してくれ！<yesno><close>: Partner! Give me the Stone of Protection!<yesno><close>

264102.「今は 押し問答している 時間も惜しい。\n くそう！ 悪く思わないでくれ！:
I don't have time to argue with you right now.
Damn it! No hard feelings!

264103.護りの盾アンルシアは <pc>から\n強引に 護り手の秘石を 奪い取った！:
Anlucia forcibly took the Stone of Protection
from <pc>!

264104.<pc>は 護り手の秘石を\nアンルシアに渡した。:
<pc> gave the Stone of Protection
to Anlucia.

264105.「秘石に宿る 護りのチカラよ！\n 破壊を止める 盾となれッ！:
The power of protection that sleeps in this
Stone! Be the shield that halts destruction!

264106.「あきらめろ！ もう 手遅れだ！: Give it up! It's too late!

264107.「……やむをえません。脱出しましょう！: ...We have no choice. We have to leave, now!
